Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd Street/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd Street/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Kedzie, 99th, Western, and 103rd due to, street blockage at 103rd Street/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Kimball and Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball to Clark/Lake due to a mechanical problem on a train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball to Clark/Lake due to a mechanical problem on a train.

As a result, trains are operating in the Loop, downtown.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station staff for further assistance, or visit transitchicago.com.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
